text: Scotch-Irish or Scots-Irish may refer to; * Ulster Scots people, an ethnic group in the Ulster province of Ireland which can trace its roots back to settlers from Scotland and northern England * Ulster Scots language a protected language under the European Charter for Regional or Minority Languages * Scots-Irish American, descendents of the Ulster Scots people who first migrated to North America in large numbers beginning in the early 18th century
title: Scots-Irish
